Test Case: Verify new user can register with valid details
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to registration page
2. Enter valid name, email, password
3. Accept terms and conditions
4. Click Register button
Expected Result: User account created successfully and redirected to dashboard

Test Case: Verify registration fails with existing email
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to registration page
2. Enter existing email address
3. Fill other required fields
4. Click Register

Test Case: Verify registration fails with invalid email format
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to registration page
2. Enter invalid email (e.g., 'invalid-email')
3. Fill other fields
4. Click Register

Test Case: Verify password strength validation
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to registration page
2. Enter weak password (e.g., '123')
3. Fill other fields
4. Click Register

Test Case: Verify user can login with valid credentials
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter valid email and password
3. Click Login button
Expected Result: User logged in and redirected to dashboard

Test Case: Verify login fails with incorrect password
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter valid email with wrong password
3. Click Login

Test Case: Verify login fails with non-existent email
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter non-registered email
3. Enter any password
4. Click Login

Test Case: Verify 2FA setup process
Test Steps:
1. Go to profile settings
2. Click Enable 2FA
3. Scan QR code with authenticator app
4. Enter verification code
5. Submit
Expected Result: 2FA enabled successfully with recovery codes displayed

Test Case: Verify login with 2FA enabled
Test Steps:
1. Login with email/password
2. Enter valid 2FA code from authenticator
3. Submit

Test Case: Verify login fails with invalid 2FA code
Test Steps:
1. Login with email/password
2. Enter invalid 2FA code
3. Submit

Test Case: Verify password reset email sent
Test Steps:
1. Click Forgot Password
2. Enter registered email
3. Submit

Test Case: Verify user can logout successfully
Test Steps:
1. Click user avatar/menu
2. Click Logout
Expected Result: User logged out and redirected to login page

Test Case: Verify user can update profile information
Test Steps:
1. Go to profile settings
2. Update name and other fields
3. Save changes

Test Case: Verify user can upload profile picture
Test Steps:
1. Go to profile settings
2. Click upload avatar
3. Select valid image file
4. Save

Test Case: Verify user can upload KYC documents (manual mode)
Pre-conditions: Logged in user with KYC not verified
Test Steps:
1. Go to KYC verification
2. Upload front ID document
3. Upload back ID document
4. Upload selfie
5. Submit
Expected Result: Documents uploaded and status changed to pending

Test Case: Verify invalid file types rejected for KYC
Test Steps:
1. Go to KYC verification
2. Try to upload non-image file (e.g., PDF)
3. Submit

Test Case: Verify admin can approve KYC submission
Pre-conditions: Admin user with pending KYC submissions
Test Steps:
1. Login as admin
2. Go to KYC management
3. View pending submission
4. Click Approve
Expected Result: KYC status updated to verified for user

Test Case: Verify admin can reject KYC submission with reason
Pre-conditions: Admin user with pending KYC submissions
Test Steps:
1. Login as admin
2. Go to KYC management
3. View pending submission
4. Enter rejection reason
5. Click Reject
Expected Result: KYC status updated to rejected with reason

Test Case: Verify user can view available investment plans
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to investments page
2. View available plans
Expected Result: All active investment plans displayed with details

Test Case: Verify user can purchase investment plan
Pre-conditions: Logged in user with sufficient wallet balance
Test Steps:
1. Go to investment plans
2. Select a plan
3. Enter investment amount
4. Confirm purchase
Expected Result: Investment created successfully and wallet debited

Test Case: Verify investment fails with insufficient balance
Pre-conditions: Logged in user with low wallet balance
Test Steps:
1. Go to investment plans
2. Select a plan
3. Enter amount exceeding balance
4. Confirm

Test Case: Verify daily ROI credited correctly for fixed plans
Pre-conditions: User with active fixed ROI investment
Test Steps:
1. Wait for daily ROI processing
2. Check wallet balance
3. Verify transaction history
Expected Result: ROI amount credited matching plan percentage

Test Case: Verify variable ROI calculated consistently
Pre-conditions: Multiple users with same variable ROI plan
Test Steps:
1. Wait for daily ROI processing
2. Compare ROI percentage for all users
Expected Result: Same ROI percentage applied to all users for same plan on same day

Test Case: Verify investment expires at 3x cap
Test Steps:
1. Monitor investment earnings
2. Wait until total earnings reach 3x base
Expected Result: Investment marked as expired when cap reached

Test Case: Verify 6x cap for qualified referrers
Pre-conditions: Qualified referrer with oldest active package
Test Steps:
1. Check qualification status
2. Monitor earnings on oldest package
Expected Result: 6x cap applied instead of 3x for qualified referrers

Test Case: Verify $10 bot fee on first package only
Test Steps:
1. User purchases first investment
2. Check deductions
Expected Result: Bot fee of $10 deducted from first package only

Test Case: Verify referral link generation
Test Steps:
1. Go to referrals page
2. Copy referral link
Expected Result: Unique referral link displayed and copyable

Test Case: Verify 8% commission on new investment
Pre-conditions: User with referral who makes investment
Test Steps:
1. Referral makes investment of $100
2. Check sponsor wallet

Test Case: Verify ROI-based commissions up to 10 levels
Test Steps:
1. Downline earns daily ROI
2. Check upline wallets at each level
Expected Result: Commission percentages credited per level configuration

Test Case: Verify referral tree visualization
Pre-conditions: User with multiple levels of referrals
Test Steps:
1. Go to referral tree page
2. Expand tree nodes
Expected Result: Tree structure displayed correctly with all levels
